turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I got to order four large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 4, alright, what would you like on the first one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Let's get the one as a Hurricane Pizza, let's get the second one as the Pepperoni Palooza, let's get the third one as.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The farmers market pizza and let's get the fourth one with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sausage, pepperoni, and sundried tomatoes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, let me make sure i got that right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 4 large pizzas, the 1st a hurricane special pizza. the 2nd is a pepperoni polluza. The 3rd one is a Farmers Market, and 4th has extra cheese, sausage, pepperoni, and Sun dried tomatoes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. You know what? Can you add Do they have any sweet toppings like strawberry?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they have chocolate chips and bananas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you put bananas on the one with.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sausage, pepperoni, and sundried tomatoes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the 4th one? sure.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so the last one is extra cheese, sausage, pepperoni, and Sun dried tomatoes and bananas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright! anything else for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, do you think that last one will be good?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i can't be sure, since I don't have taste buds, but i can't say that i've ever hear that combination before.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. Yeah, I think let's still order it. Yeah, let's let's confirm the order. Everything on that is good. And I need everything in thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure! do let me know how it is, next time you order!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yea think crust added!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright the total for these 4 pizzas will be $66.78.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one moment while I send your order to Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're all set, your order is in the works and should be ready for pickup in 40 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anything else i can help with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that should be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: have a great day!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: goodbye.
